import React from 'react'; import { CartItemsContext } from '../../components/context/cartContext'; import ProductQuanityBox from './../../components/ProductQuanity'; import '../styles/Checkout.css'; function Checkout() { const { products, subTotal } = React.useContext(CartItemsContext); const testQuanity = (bar) => console.log(bar); return (

{`$${price}`}

))}

); } export default Checkout;
